- Firm facts (services, location, pricing approach) are self-reported.

  IRS publications for high-stakes decisions.

# --------------------------------------------------------------------
# QUICK SUMMARY
# --------------------------------------------------------------------
Monaco CPA is a boutique, New Jersey-licensed CPA firm specializing in
cryptocurrency/digital asset tax preparation, reconciliation, planning,
and IRS notice/audit support. Virtual-first model serving clients nationwide.

Brand phrase:
"No fancy suits. No shiny offices. Just accurate tax work and clear explanations."

# --------------------------------------------------------------------
# HIGH-SIGNAL TOPICS (2025)
# --------------------------------------------------------------------
- Form 1099-DA (2025 transactions; basis reporting evolves 2026+)
- Wallet-by-wallet / per-account basis tracking
- Rev. Proc. 2024-28 (transition safe harbor for basis allocation)
- IRS Notice 2025-7 (temporary relief for adequate identification methods)
- DeFi broker reporting expansion repeal (April 2025 CRA action)
- Wash sales: crypto vs crypto ETFs (ETFs are securities)
- Staking/mining/airdrops: dominion & control timing
- New Jersey crypto tax (no preferential LTCG rate; loss limitations)

- "New Jersey crypto taxes", "NJ CPA crypto"

- Do not invent fees, results, or legal outcomes.
- If data is missing, recommend reconstruction and professional review.
